manifest.author: iamzainnnn
manifest.changelog:
@iamzainnnn's Instafel Backup v15

*Enabled new text effects on stories.
*Enabled new valentine fonts on stories.
*Enabled timed polls in reels post.
*Enabled a new reply bar for Reels in chats.
*Enabled social channels.
(now you can create a social channel)
*Enabled music shortcut button in message composer.
*Enabled whatsapp option in profile.
(now you can link your whatsapp account directly in profile.)
*Enabled voice message forwarding.
*Enabled voice message transcription.
*Enabled link preview in chats.
*Enabled whatsapp status button in sharesheet.
(Not working yet.)
*Improved story opening animation.
*Updated voice note background playback.
*Updated meta ai voice.
*Updated follow request design.
*Fixed some minor bugs.
manifest.description: This backup maked for the newest features!
